resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73353</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73353</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>91f86a54-b6fd-493d-af2d-774338f8acd0#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vidra fotója</string>
            <string language="en">Otter's photo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foto des Otters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La photo de la loutre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Foto da lontra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foto della lontra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφία ενυδρίδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Foto de la nutria</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hazai vidraállomány az élőhely elvesztése és a kíméletlen vadászat következtében erősen megfogyatkozott</string>
            <string language="en">The national stock of otter has run low very much as a result of loss of the habitat and the cruel hunting</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">természetvédelem,  védett fajok,  ragadozók,  emlősök,  </string>
            <string language="en">preservation, protected species, carnivorous, mammals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der nationale Vorrat an Otter ist niedrig sehr 
viel resultierend aus Verlust des Lebensraums und der grausamen Jagd 
gelaufen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les actions nationales de la loutre ont 
fonctionné bas infiniment en raison de la perte de l'habitat et de la
chasse cruelle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estoque nacional da lontra funcionou o ponto 
baixo muito muito em conseqüência da perda do habitat e da caça 
cruel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le azione nazionali della lontra hanno funzionato
basso molto come conseguenza di perdita dell'habitat e della 
caccia crudele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εθνικό απόθεμα της ενυδρίδας έχει τρέξει χαμηλό 
πάρα πολύ ως αποτέλεσμα της απώλειας του βιότοπου και του 
σκληρού κυνηγιού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La acción nacional de la nutria se ha ejecutado 
bajo mucho como resultado de la pérdida del habitat y de la caza 
cruel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewahrung, geschützte Sorte, fleischfressend, 
Säugetiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conservation, espèces protégées, carnivores, 
mammifères</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">preservação, espécie protegida, carnivorous, 
mamíferos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conservazione, specie protetta, carnivora, mammiferi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντήρηση, προστατευμένα είδη, σαρκοφάγα, θηλαστικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">preservación, especie protegida, carnívora, 
mamíferos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73353</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=91f86a54-b6fd-493d-af2d-774338f8acd0&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
